summary: Ever wondered, why the allmighty dragonborne has to catch his breath after shoutin a little burst of fire? I mean, there are so many people shouting all day, so why not the dragonborn? This mods adds an craftable amulet to the game, which reduces the cooldown between shouts to 0.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://fs1.directupload.net/images/150427/gx5yt7s7.png[/img][/center]

Ever wondered, why the allmighty dragonborne has to catch his breath after shoutin a little burst of fire? I mean, there are so many people shouting all day, so why not the dragonborn? This mods adds an craftable amulet to the game, which reduces the cooldown between shouts to 0.

CRAFTING:

To craft this artifact, go to a forge. You will need one gold ingot, one ruby and one dragon scale.

I would love to hear your suggestions!

Feel free to endorse or give feedback. Enjoy the mod!

No DLCs needed
Known bugs: none
no incompatibility with other mods known
author: WarriorOfFaith
